MajorClaims.MC1: if the good people always get an happy ending, I don’t think it’s proper
MajorClaims.MC2: movies and TV programs should present different stories in which good people get reward or get nothing

Claims.C1: we can’t always let good people be rewarded in movies or TV programs
Claims.C2: if children always watch the TV programs that good people get rewarded, they may think it will be true in the real world
Claims.C3: we should show people the truth in the stories
